descriptors.name: sidewalk_hello_neighbor_ble
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Hello Neighbor
descriptors.description: The Hello Neighbor Bluetooth sample application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to connect to the cloud using a Bluetooth connection. The application connects to AWS and send or receive messages on button push.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk

descriptors.name: sidewalk_hello_neighbor_ble
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Hello Neighbor
descriptors.description: A simple application which does the AWS registration and the actual communication over bluetooth. The application can connect to AWS and send or receive messages on button push.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk

descriptors.name: sidewalk_ble_subghz_cli
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Sub-GHz CLI
descriptors.description: The Bluetooth sub-GHz Command Line Interface (CLI) sample application allows the user to interact with the endpoint using CLI commands. The application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to exchange data between the endpoint and the AWS Cloud using one of the 3 radio layers.

properties.value: brd4186b brd4186c brd4187b brd4187c brd4198a com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk

descriptors.name: sidewalk_ble_subghz_cli
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Sub-GHz CLI
descriptors.description: The Bluetooth sub-GHz Command Line Interface (CLI) sample application allows the user to interact with the endpoint using CLI commands. The application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to exchange data between the endpoint and the AWS Cloud using one of the 3 radio layers.

descriptors.name: sidewalk_hello_neighbor_ble_subghz
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Sub-GHz Hello Neighbor
descriptors.description: A simple application which does the AWS registration via bluetooth and the actual communication is going over FSK. The application can connect to AWS and send or receive messages via awscli commands.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk

descriptors.description: A simple application which does the AWS registration via bluetooth and the actual communication is going over FSK. The application can connect to AWS and send or receive messages on button push.

descriptors.name: sidewalk_hello_neighbor_ble_subghz
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Sub-GHz Hello Neighbor
descriptors.description: The Hello Neighbor Bluetooth sub-GHz sample application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to connect to the cloud using sub-GHz FSK or CSS modulation. The application connects to AWS and send or receive messages on button push.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk
